name: Compressed CD Image File
summary: CD disc image file used by the pSX emulator , a program used to play Sony PlayStation 1 games; compressed in zlib format, which is a format used by PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360; compressed file saves hard drive space and uses less cache memory; all CD image formats, except for .ISO files, can be converted into CDZ files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
